text: ۞ فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفٌ أَضَاعُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَلۡقَوۡنَ غَيًّا
translation: 59. Tokkel meqe marih lakal uma maray salat baysaah sinni kalbi fayxiixa kataata keenil ciggiile, toysa too mari sarrah jahannam girah adda I yan daqaaray ghayyi deqsitah addal umaanee kee finqi ken geele.
